title: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work
description: Color orange is not being displayed correctly in the preview.
OB: When I select the orange color in the preview, it is not displayed correctly.
EB: When I select the orange color in the preview, it should be displayed correctly.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the preview. 2. Select the orange color from the color picker. 3. Verify if the selected color is displayed correctly in the preview.
